replies.body: Lol this is nothing i guess you're one of the unlucky ones where riot actually follows up on a report once in a blue moon still surprised you got a chat ban for this, I've said worse

you talk to much. stop it. get some help

The system doesn't care if there is multiple reports.

It only takes into account right or false report.
If a player was toxic, they will get banned. Even if there is only 1 report.
If there is 9 reports and they are all false reports; then it's deemed to be invalid.

But I do agree. 

You should not be banned.

Players that want to quit early after a few deaths are fairies for sure. Idiots like that need to learn how to play defensive, not go for kills when behind. Stop the bleeding so that their team has a chance to carry them. But yeah the common misconception in soloqueue is that a lot of people think that they have to carry every game and cannot adjust their mindset when they fall behind.
